sentence.Network_en: I want to leave the surface of earth, elope to the moon!
sentence.Network_cn: 我要离开地球表面, 私奔到月球!

sentence.Network_en: Forgetting Dia at home, he planned for Hera to elope with him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他忘记了家里的黛.他盘算着要让赫位与他一道私奔.

sentence.Network_en: However, Li Xin misunderstands that she will elope with Li L ü.
sentence.Network_cn: 可是, 李信却误会她想与李律一起私奔.

water taxi的意思中文翻译 ... elongationpass 延伸孔型 elope 私奔, 潜逃, 出走 elopement 潜逃, 私奔.
... dump v. drop carelessly 倾倒，把…砰地一扔 elope v. run away from home 私奔，出走 environ n. surrounding 周围，附近地区.

list.abs: to elope to some nameless place ., 要私奔到某一个不知名的地方.
Her elopement was a great blow to the parents ., 她的出走给双亲很大的打击.
The couple eloped last night ., 昨晚上他们俩私奔了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the general sense 'abscond, run away'): from Anglo-Norman French aloper, perhaps related to leap

entry.def: When two people elope, they go away secretly together to get married.

example.ex: My girlfriend Lynn and I eloped...
In 1912 he eloped with Frieda von Richthofen.
example.tran: 1912年，他和弗丽达·冯·里希特霍芬私奔了。

means.word_mean: 1. run away secretly with one's beloved;

sentences.sentence: "The young couple eloped and got married in Las Vegas"
